plays.text: Penalty to Andrei Markov 2 minutes for Tripping David Backes
Penalty to Brad Boyes 2 minutes for Tripping Christopher Higgins
Goal scored by Steve Regier assisted by Cam Janssen and Cam Paddock
Penalty to Robert Lang 2 minutes for Hooking Patrik Berglund
Penalty to David Backes 2 minutes for Interference Andrei Markov
Penalty to Andy McDonald 2 minutes for Holding Tom Kostopoulos
Penalty to Alexei Kovalev 2 minutes for Holding Barret Jackman
Penalty to David Backes 2 minutes for Hooking Alex Tanguay
Penalty to Alex Tanguay 2 minutes for Holding Barret Jackman
Penalty to Roman Polak 2 minutes for Tripping Alex Tanguay
Penalty to Eric Brewer 2 minutes for Hooking Sergei Kostitsyn
Penalty to Cam Janssen 2 minutes for Elbowing Alexei Kovalev
Penalty to Patrice Brisebois 2 minutes for Holding Jay McClement
Goal scored by Andrei Kostitsyn assisted by Carey Price
Penalty to Christopher Higgins 2 minutes for Hooking Barret Jackman
Goal scored by Steve Regier (Power Play) assisted by David Perron and Jeff Woywitka
Penalty to Andrei Kostitsyn 2 minutes for High-sticking Patrik Berglund
Penalty to David Perron 2 minutes for Interference Francis Bouillon
Goal scored by Robert Lang assisted by Andrei Kostitsyn
Penalty to Francis Bouillon 2 minutes for Interference Cam Paddock
Penalty to David Perron 2 minutes for Boarding Ryan O'Byrne
Penalty to Saku Koivu 2 minutes for Interference - Goalkeeper Manny Legace
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Steve Regier
Brad Boyes shootout attempt against Carey Price with a Wide of Net results in a MISS.
Saku Koivu shootout attempt against Manny Legace with a Wide of Net results in a MISS.
David Perron shootout attempt against Carey Price with a Wristshot results in a SAVE.
Andrei Kostitsyn shootout attempt against Manny Legace with a Hit Goalpost results in a MISS.
Keith Tkachuk shootout attempt against Carey Price with a Backhand results in a SAVE.
Alexei Kovalev shootout attempt against Manny Legace with a Backhand results in a GOAL.
